text: Could the HelpDeskBot be replaced by a more informative channel topic?  I feel like it's mostly just helping us burn through our message limit

elements.text: Could the HelpDeskBot be replaced by a more informative channel topic?  I feel like it's mostly just helping us burn through our message limit

text: Can we cross post this publicly to <https://discourse.julialang.org|Discourse> for further visibility? React with :bridge: on the message above to approve. <https://github.com/JuliaCommunity/SlackBridge/blob/main/README.md#faq|More info here>

I feel that the number of people who read the channel topic on a helpdesk channel is probably vanishingly small.

I think it is very valuable that it starts a new thread which helps to keep conversations contained and makes the whole channel more usable.
